answers.answer: I kno in excited and my mom family and friends have gotten us everything we need we havent had to buy anything lol its so wonderful.

question: My mom did an awesome job i was shocked it turned out so well. I thought she would overdo it. She made awesome decorations with diapers and made a watermelon baby with fruit in it. The games were actually fun and I havent had to buy hardly anything for this baby lol he  is so spoiled. So thankful and happy ready for baby boy to be here lol im 36 weeks and think I will get bad news at my appointment tomorrow...I may have preeclampsia. Jus wanted to share my happiness and excitement.
title: baby shower
